mbean.name: CachedConnectionManager
mbean.description: CachedConnectionManager keeps track of connections held by objects that register with it.

operation.name: enter
operation.description: Called by interceptor stack on entering a method call

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: An object key for the target of the method invocation. Normally the ejb instance object

parameter.name: unshareableResources
parameter.description: The set of connection factories whose connections cannot be shared

operation.name: exit
operation.description: Called by interceptor stack on exiting a method call

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: An object key for the target of the method call. Normally the ejb instance

parameter.name: unshareableResources
parameter.description: The set of connection factories whose connections cannot be shared

operation.name: handleObtained
operation.description: Called by the connection manager when a connection handle is created

parameter.name: metaCallConnectionInterceptor
parameter.description: ConnectionInterceptor responsible for communication with this object

operation.name: handleReleased
operation.description: Called by the connection manager when a connection handle is closed

parameter.name: metaCallConnectionInterceptor
parameter.description: ConnectionInterceptor responsible for communication with this object
